Minah Ogbenyealu Bird, (nke a makwaara dị ka Mynah Bird, 11 Machị 1950 na Julaị 1995) bụ onye Naijirịa na-ese onyinyo na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na United Kingdom na 1970s.
Bird si Aba na Naijirịa ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Naijarịa na Finland.

Mgbe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri ndị dị ka Up Pompeii (1971), Four Dimensions of Greta (1972), The Love Box (1972), Layout for 5 Models (1972), Percy's Progress (1974), Vampira (1974), Alfie Darling (1976), The Stud (1978), The London Connection (1979) na A Nightingale Sang in Berkeley Square (1979)

A kọwara ya dị ka "naanị onye isi ojii na-eme ihe nkiri mmekọahụ na Britain", ọ lara n'iyi n'ihu ọha site na ngwụcha afọ 1970 ma chọta ya nwụrụ anwụ n'ụlọ ya na London, izu ole na ole mgbe o nwesịrị nkụchi obi na 1995.
E depụtara Bird dị ka otu n'ime "ndị isi ojii na-emepụta ejiji nke kwadebere ụzọ maka ụmụ nwanyị ojii na ejiji" n'akụkụ Iman na Grace Jones.
Ọ pụtara n'ihu magazin Oz na Nọvemba 1970. A na-eto ya na usoro na Sunday Mirror n'etiti afọ 70 nke malitere usoro akụkọ Kiss N Tell na akwụkwọ akụkọ.
